abstract.text: mimik Client Library for iOS provides a programmatic way to work with the edgeEngine Runtime to access information about the mobile device on which the application is running.

inlineContent.text: is to provide a programmatic way to work with the edgeEngine Runtime to access information about the mobile device on which the application is running, as well as mobile devices running within a cluster of mobile devices that are hosting the edgeEngine Runtime. Also, to allow developers to use edge microservices running within a particular cluster.

of the mimik Client Library, developers can build applications compatible with the edgeEngine Runtime. This not only harnesses the strength of edge computing but also provides an inherent flexibility in its paradigm.

Additionally, this component provides utility APIs that help developers with core operations such as Authentication, edgeEngine Runtime Setup, deployment of edge microservices and handling of Network calls.
provides edgeEngine Runtime lifecycle control APIs, as well as vendoring the actual edgeEngine Runtime binary into the iOS project.

The purpose of the mimik Client Library is to provide a programmatic way to work with the edgeEngine Runtime to access information about the mobile device on which the application is running, as well as mobile devices running within a cluster of mobile devices that are hosting the edgeEngine Runtime. Also, to allow developers to use edge microservices running within a particular cluster.
